Articles.Content: 2376: Everything seems to be upside down! The floor/roof collapses and you end up on 2377.

2378: You find a large 96 page manuscript of the ramblings of some internet forum users. Interesting, you take it with you.

*You've got mail a new tool!*

2379: You've made it to the roof!

 

...oh wait, this is just a room painted to look like the roof. Never mind.
.sdrawkcad si moor ehT :0832
2381: You walk into the middle of a meeting of the Cult of the Eye Pokers. They poke you in the eye, and you leave.
2382:  You walk into a jam session with The Cult.  The play Fire Woman, and you leave.

2383: You climb up to an empty metallic room. As you step in, the doors slam shut sealing you inside.

"No Mr. Bond," a voice says, "I intend to kill you!"

At that moment, the room shrinks into a 8x8 foot pod with windows on all sides and begins to fall, crashing into each floor below it.

You black out and wake up with the shards of the building spilled around you.

You're in the basement!?

That can't be right! This is floor -1!

In the basement, you find an elevator. It looks like it has cookies inside! You go to get the cookies, but the door shuts behind you. The elevator is covered in buttons. You press one, and it takes you to floor two thousand, three hundred and eighty four.

2385: there is nothing but toe...

 

You leave quickly.
2386:  It appears to be a floor of Halloween! It's a bit late though... Squid game and among us people jump out and scare you! You run up the conveniently placed stairs to floor 2387.

2387:

Your friend is on this floor wasting time on some odd spaceflight forum.

Idiot.

You go to the next floor.

You see what is on the next floor,  2388.

There is a bunch of alligators having a birthday party.
2389: An exact replica of Mir.

2390: It seems to be a replica of space... "Why am I not dying?" You ask yourself.

You float to the next floor...
2391: The entire room is completely filled with cake. It takes you hours to dig your way through to the other side. By the end, your clothes have thousands of extra calories in them.
2392 : It’s an exercise room! Seems to go along with the previous floor.
2393: It's a break room! You fall asleep immediately because on the previous floor you did 10000 pushups.

2394

You wake up on the next floor.

2395

Its a blank room, so you go away
2396: The walls are covered in advertisements.

2397: You step out from the stairs to find yourself in a white room that is well lit and reflective, almost like the walls are made of some sort of glass. Along one wall are 2 vending machines and a classic arcade game called Elevator Action. It's distinctive theme music plays as the attraction mode displays a character going between floors of a building, getting files from rooms and dodging hat clad bad guys. It triggers something in you, a faint sensation that the reason you keep going up is because something is following you and you have to stay ahead of it. You use the vending machines to stock up on supplies and then realise that one wall you thought was painted differently to the rest, is actually a rare window. You step over and look out. In front of you you see black, broken up by twinkling stars, you look down and see far below you a planet curving away from what must be the base of this tower. You marvel at how far you have come but again you feel the urgency that says you must keep going. You look around you for stairs to go up, but instead there is some hollow glass tube. You step over to it and feel an uprush of air. You take a deep breath and step in to the tube. As it lifts you up to the next floor you wonder what you will come across next and if you will ever reach an end.
2398: Christmas Room! The room is decorated with Christmas decorations and there are tons of presents under the tree.

2399: A sign saying: "The last floor was decorated two years ago". There is another room. There is a tree, but it seems a whole lot smaller. There is only one present, addressed to "me" from "me". Calendar says 2021. There's a laptop on an eternally lagging videocall.

Edited December 25, 2021 by OrdinaryKerman

2400: A spaceport with passenger ships arriving and leaving is on this floor. There is a lounge and tubes going off in all directions, leading to docking ports, you hesitate, unsure whether to continue up or find a ship to leave on.

Edited December 26, 2021 by ColdJ
Floor 2401: You assist a Kerbal while she builds a rocket the size of the building (in fact, it's the Launch Tower).
